explains: n. 新闻用纸（等于 newspaper）

sentences.en: The Wall Street Journal uses 220,000 tonnes of newsprint each year.
sentences.cn: 《华尔街日报》每年使用22万吨新闻纸。

sentences.en: They struck a deal with their paper supplier, getting two years of newsprint on credit.
sentences.cn: 他们与其纸张供应商达成一个协议，可以赊购两年的新闻纸。

sentences.en: They get their hands covered in newsprint.
sentences.cn: 他们的手上沾满了油墨。
